tool.name: Train model
tool.description: Trains a model (or multiple models) using CellOrganizer

param.name: image_set
param.label: Choose a data set for training

param.name: mask_set
param.label: Provide an (optional) set of segmented cell masks

param.name: trainingflag
param.label: Selected the cellular componants desired for modeling

param.name: modelname
param.label: Provide a name for the model

param.name: modelid
param.label: Provide an (optional) id for the model

param.name: downsample
param.label: Select a downsampling factor, larger values return a possible more coarse model

param.name: nucleustype
param.label: Select a nuclear model type

param.name: nucleusname
param.label: Provide an (optional) name for the nuclear model

param.name: nucleusclass
param.label: Select nuclear model class

param.name: nucleusid
param.label: Provide an (optional) id for the nuclear model

param.name: celltype
param.label: Select a cell model type

param.name: cellname
param.label: Provide an (optional) name for the cell model

param.name: cellclass
param.label: Select a cell model class

param.name: cellid
param.label: Provide an (optional) id for the cell model

param.name: proteintype
param.label: Select a protein model type

param.name: proteinname
param.label: Provide an (optional) name for the protein model

param.name: proteinclass
param.label: Select a protein model class

param.name: proteinid
param.label: Provide an (optional) id for the protein model

param.name: proteincytonucclearflag
param.label: Select a protein location

param.name: documentation
param.label: Provide any (optional) documentation for the model or images used in training

param.name: verbose
param.label: If true, print all information provided during training (advanced feature)

param.name: debug
param.label: If true, save intermediate results (advanced feature)

tool.help:
**Description**
Train a cellular model in CellOrganizer
-----
**Output**
A trained cell organizer model
